name: Crystal Harpoon
description:
Crystal Harpoon is a short Adventure-Platformer where you must traverse a deep cavern to find your curios and naughty puppy. Wielding your trusty crystal harpoon you must swing over gaps to descend to the end of the cavern. 

This game was a solo project for the Global Game Jam in 2021.

There is a secret ending where you may or may not be able to PAT THE DOG!!!
Explore thoroughly and have fun!
